meanings.definition: Capable of being stretched the most.
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was the stretchiest in the whole pack.
meanings.sent2: The yoga pants were the stretchiest of all the options.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was so stretchy, it could wrap around the entire city!
meanings.sent4: Her patience was the stretchiest rubber band, always able to handle more.
meanings.sent5: The bubblegum was the stretchiest, able to be pulled into long, thin strands.

meanings.definition: Having the greatest ability to stretch.
meanings.sent1: The fabric was the stretchiest material she had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: The athlete wore the stretchiest shorts for maximum flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The clown's balloon animals were so stretchy, they seemed to come to life!
meanings.sent4: His imagination was the stretchiest rubber band, reaching the farthest corners of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The slime was the stretchiest, able to be pulled and twisted endlessly.

meanings.sent1: The rubber band was the stretchiest one in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The headband was the stretchiest she had ever worn.
meanings.sent3: The robot's arms were so stretchy, it could reach any shelf in the room!
meanings.sent4: His mind was the stretchiest rubber band, adapting to any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The dough was the stretchiest, easily molded into different shapes.
